metadata.Title: CVE-2015-9099 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The lame_init_params function in lame.c in libmp3lame.a in LAME 3.99.5allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid read andapplication crash) via a crafted audio file with a negative sample rate.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-9099` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lame - 3.99.5+repack1-9build1
libmp3lame0 - 3.99.5+repack1-9build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lame package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.99.5+repack1-9build1').
